attributes.additional_details: In Winslow there is no good exersise for young adults who find the childrens playground, well childish, and s it seems they resort to causing trouble but having a skatepark would stop this issue becuase there is something for them to do. Having a skatepark in winslow will be fun for all ages from little kids on scoters to 19year olsd on bmx's. And i think winslow's happiness overall would benifit from this disicion.
attributes.background: There are alot of enthusiastic skaters (and scooterers) in winslow who have to go a minimum of 6 miles to go to a skatepark.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The building of a skate park is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
